text:
Hi! Seeing that the search script on the post just shows the number of jobs that meets certain criteria and not the jobs per se, I decide to build a better search and filtering engine. You can find it here:

https://jtefera.com/hn/?url=https://news.ycombinator.com/ite...

This is just a search and filtering app so if you need a map or some other options, the https://whoishiring.io page by xando is a very good resource!

Hope it helps! Feedback is welcomed.
